plot outline: Indran (Vishal) is a boy suffering from Narcolepsy since childhood. It is a rare neurological disorder that affects the control of sleep and he falls asleep at any point of time when he experience any extreme form of excitement or emotion. Indran has 10 specific desires in life which he wants to fulfill. He is aided by his friends (Jagan and Sundar Ramu) as he ventures forth to fulfill his life ambitions, egged on by his loving and caring mother (Saranya Ponvannan). Indran meets Meera (Lakshmi Menon) daughter of a rich business man (Jayaprakash) and her curiosity in him slowly turn into love. But her dad fears that Indran cannot lead a happy married life and will not be able to make him a grand-father. But the brave girl takes an extreme step to help her lover overcome his disorder. However fate intervenes cruelly as she is brutally gang raped in front of Indran who is on sleep-mode. Whether Indran identifies the real culprits forms the rest of the plot.
title: Naan Sigappu Manithan
akas: I Am a Red Man (World-wide, English title)
plot: A narcoleptic becomes a vigilante when tragedy strikes.

Indran (Vishal) is a boy suffering from Narcolepsy since childhood. It is a rare neurological disorder that affects the control of sleep and he falls asleep at any point of time when he experience any extreme form of excitement or emotion. Indran has 10 specific desires in life which he wants to fulfill. He is aided by his friends (Jagan and Sundar Ramu) as he ventures forth to fulfill his life ambitions, egged on by his loving and caring mother (Saranya Ponvannan). Indran meets Meera (Lakshmi Menon) daughter of a rich business man (Jayaprakash) and her curiosity in him slowly turn into love. But her dad fears that Indran cannot lead a happy married life and will not be able to make him a grand-father. But the brave girl takes an extreme step to help her lover overcome his disorder. However fate intervenes cruelly as she is brutally gang raped in front of Indran who is on sleep-mode. Whether Indran identifies the real culprits forms the rest of the plot.::Anitha

This fresh and bold psychological drama delves into the subject of Narcolepsy, a rare neurological sleep-disorder that alters normal sleep patterns, and induces sleep in those suffering from the illness, especially when they experience heightened emotions such as anger, love, hatred, sorrow, and pain. Indra is a normal young man with many dreams and ambitions, but every aspect of his life is hindered by the seemingly insurmountable obstacle of narcolepsy. How will he face the complexities brought about in his life by the illness? Will he succeed in protecting the love of his life and accomplish his goals despite the disorder?::Santhosh
